attributes.action: Stop the use of animals in circuses
attributes.additional_details: All over the world wild animals are used in circuses.Although circuses claim they train their animals in a positive way there are millions of pictures and prices of evidence out there to show that's false.Animals can be beaten,caged,chained,mis-fed and forced to do things they don't want to do.Imagine what it would be like to be the animal.If they could speak imagine how disgraced they would be at the way their treated.The action I would like the government to take is to ban the use of wild animals in circuses..If you care please sign. Kind Regards and Thank you Adam Cooper S1 Student.
